Flub.Name: Intensity
Flub.Description: Flattening intensity of the coastal area.

Flub.Name: Water Level
Flub.Description: Relative water level by which coastal erosion is applied. You can enter a precise height such as `500m` by right-clicking.

Flub.Name: Beach Size
Flub.Description: Width of the flattened or beach area between the central body and the coast.

Flub.Name: Transition
Flub.Description: Controls how smoothly the beach transitions into the mainland.
